title: Splintered
description: Eight years. It’s been eight years since the incident. The one that left me broken and in darkness. No amount of time can heal the loss of my family.Then they appeared. Three men who claim to know me, to have shared a past full of love with me.The only problem? I don’t remember them. It’s clear there are pieces of my life missing, and they are holding secrets. Secrets that might explain why I’m now caught up in the midst of a supernatural battle, with danger lurking in the smoky shadows, and what happened all those years ago.Will these be brought to light or will I find myself shrouded in the dark with no way out?This is a dark paranormal reverse harem intended for an 18+ audience. Content warning: Thoughts of suicide
author: Iris James
